search.query: index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | stats count as total_users
index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | eval last_login_epoch=strptime(lastLoginAt,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") | eval days_since_login=(now()-last_login_epoch)/86400 | where days_since_login <= 30 | stats count

index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | eval last_login_epoch=strptime(lastLoginAt,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") | eval days_since_login=(now()-last_login_epoch)/86400 | where days_since_login > 30 AND days_since_login <= 90 | stats count
index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | eval last_login_epoch=strptime(lastLoginAt,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") | eval days_since_login=(now()-last_login_epoch)/86400 | where days_since_login > 90 | stats count
index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | where isnull(lastLoginAt) OR lastLoginAt="" | stats count

index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | eval last_login_epoch=strptime(lastLoginAt,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") | eval days_since_login=round((now()-last_login_epoch)/86400,0) | eval roles_str=tostring(roles) | where match(roles_str,"admin|system|super") AND (isnull(days_since_login) OR days_since_login > 30) | table username email roles ssoEnabled lastLoginAt days_since_login | sort - days_since_login

index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | eval roles_str=tostring(roles) | where ssoEnabled=false AND match(roles_str,"admin|system|super") | table username email roles ssoEnabled createdAt lastLoginAt | sort username

index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | eval created_epoch=strptime(createdAt,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") | eval account_age_days=round((now()-created_epoch)/86400,0) | eval age_bucket=case( account_age_days <= 30,"0â€“30", account_age_days <= 60,"31â€“60", account_age_days <= 90,"61â€“90", account_age_days <= 180,"91â€“180", account_age_days <= 365,"181â€“365", account_age_days > 365,">365" ) | stats count by age_bucket

index=* sourcetype=dragos:users | eval created_epoch=strptime(createdAt,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") | eval account_age_days=(now()-created_epoch)/86400 | eval roles_str=tostring(roles) | where match(roles_str,"admin|system|super") AND account_age_days <= 90 | table username email roles createdAt ssoEnabled | sort createdAt
